description_en: Annual number of deaths of infants less than 1 week old (including stillbirths), by state.
description_ms: Jumlah tahunan kematian bayi yang berumur kurang daripada 1 minggu (termasuk kelahiran mati), mengikut negeri.
methodology_en: A perinatal death refers to the death of an infant less than 1 week old, including stillbirths. In short, this data is a combination of the data on [stillbirths](https://data.gov.my/data-catalogue/stillbirths_state) and a subset of the data on [deaths](https://data.gov.my/data-catalogue/deaths_state). The 'state' reported in this dataset is based on the place of usual residence of the mother of the deceased, not the geographical location in which the deceased passed away. For example, if a perinatal death occurs at a hospital in Kuala Lumpur but the mother of the deceased resides in Selangor, it will be recorded as a perinatal death for Selangor. For a deeper understanding of the methodology and associated definition, please refer to the [Technical Notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/vitalstats-technotes).
methodology_ms: Kematian perinatal merujuk kepada kelahiran mati dan kematian bayi yang berumur kurang daripada 1 minggu. Dalam erti kata lain, set data ini adalah gabungan set data [kelahiran mati](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/data-catalogue/stillbirths_state) dan subset daripada set data [kematian](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/data-catalogue/deaths_state). Medan 'negeri' yang dilaporan dalam set data ini adalah berdasarkan tempat kediaman biasa ibu simati dan bukannya lokasi geografi di mana simati telah meninggal dunia. Sebagai contoh, jika kematian perinatal berlaku di sebuah hospital di Kuala Lumpur tetapi ibu simati menetap di Selangor, maka kematian tersebut akan direkodkan sebagai kematian perinatal bagi Selangor. Untuk memahami metodologi dengan lebih terperinci, sila rujuk kepada [Nota Teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/technical-notes/vitalstats-technotes).
caveat_en: This data is derived based on deaths registered with JPN. Therefore, if a perinatal death is not registered with JPN (for instance, if the perinatal death of a foreigner is registered in their home country, or the perinatal death of citizen in a remote area is not registered), it will generally not count in this dataset. However, adjustment has been made to the number of deaths in Sabah to account for the under-reporting of deaths detected based on the 'Study of Under Reporting of Deaths in Sabah', which was conducted by DOSM and approved by the Steering Committee on Implementation of Civil Registration and Vital Statistics in 2016.
caveat_ms: Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan kematian yang didaftarkan dengan JPN. Oleh itu, sekiranya kematian itu tidak didaftarkan dengan JPN (contohnya sekiranya kematian perinatal rakyat asing hanya didaftarkan di negara asal, ataupun kematian perinatal penduduk di kawasan yang sangat terpencil tidak didaftarkan) maka ia secara am tidak terkandung dalam set data ini. Namun, penyesuaian data kematian di Sabah telah dilaksanakan kerana kurang liputan pendaftaran yang didapati berdasarkan 'Kajian Kurang Liputan Pendaftaran Kematian di Sabah' yang telah dijalankan oleh DOSM dan diluluskan oleh Jawatankuasa Induk Pelaksanaan _Civil Registration and Vital Statistics_ pada tahun 2016.
publication_en: OpenDOSM features a dashboard on [Population & Vital Statistics](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/population) where you can explore this data in a more interactive manner!
publication_ms: OpenDOSM memaparkan papan pemuka tentang [Penduduk & Perangkaan Penting](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/population) yang membolehkan anda menerokai data ini dengan lebih interaktif!

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 since the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD ditetapkan sebagai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: abs
fields.description_en: [Integer] Number of perinatal deaths in that year
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Jumlah kematian perinatal dalam tahun tersebut

fields.name: rate
fields.description_en: [Float] Number of perinatal deaths per 1000 births
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Jumlah kematian perinatal bagi setiap 1000 kelahiran
